http://129.28.122.208:8089/admin/login, 参数：{"username":"testA","password":"123456"}, 方法：post

parameters.name: caseInfo

steps.name:
【数据库查询与断言】SQL：SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM ums_admin_login_log l
JOIN ums_admin a ON l.admin_id = a.id
WHERE a.username = 'testA';
，请求前记录数：0，请求后记录数：0

parameters.name: sql
parameters.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM ums_admin_login_log l
JOIN ums_admin a ON l.admin_id = a.id
WHERE a.username = 'testA';

steps.name:
【最终用例测试结果】是否通过：CaseInfo{caseId=2, caseDesc='登录不成功：账号不正确', url='
http://129.28.122.208:8089/admin/login', contentType='json', type='post', params='{"username":"testA","password":"123456"}', expectedResult='{"code":500,"message":"登录异常:用户不存在"}', sql='SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM ums_admin_login_log l
JOIN ums_admin a ON l.admin_id = a.id
WHERE a.username = 'testA';
'}，用例执行结果：true
